thag6.8:1.1_0: It was well-taught by the seer,
thag6.8:1.2_0: by the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun.
thag6.8:2.2_0: drying up the root of craving,
thag6.8:2.3_0: and, having cut off the root of poison, the slaughter-house,
thag6.8:3.1_0: By breaking the root of unknowing,
thag6.8:3.3_0: and drops the thunderbolt of knowledge
thag6.8:3.4_0: on the taking up of consciousnesses.
thag6.8:4.1_0: It informs us of our feelings,
thag6.8:4.4_0: all states of existence as a pit of burning coals.
thag6.8:5.1_0: It’s very sweet and very deep,
thag6.8:5.2_0: holding birth and death at bay;
thag6.8:5.3_0: it is the noble eightfold path—
thag6.8:6.2_0: results in the result of deeds,
thag6.8:6.4_0: as if they were in a clear light;
thag6.8:6.5_0: leading to the great sanctuary and peace,
